Name: Tale's Casino Escape
About the game: Tale's Casino Escape is a real time combat adventure RPG. All the qualities of a good RPG have been combined and applied at Tale's Casino Escape. FEATURES: - EVERY enemie can be your ally. By killing an enemy, you have a small chance of dropping itÂ´s sphere. If you get it, you can use it to fight with you! - Collect stars and unlock new stages! Each stage has some quests to complete, for each completed quest you get a star! - Like every good RPG, the game is full of hidden things! You will have to beat puzzles and have logical thinking to find them. - As said above, the game is challenging. You will have to think of several solutions if you want to complete the game 100%. *If you do not like puzzles, and logical thinking mini games, do not worry, you can play the game until the end without having to beat these types of challenges . STORY: Once upon a time there was a girl who worked in a casino. She worked so hard, that she couldn't even leave the casino. In fact she was a prisoner. So, one day, a great idea comes to her mind. She decides to ESCAPE!!! Then, on a dark and cold night, she gets out of bed, and in light steps she begins to execute her master plan, ESCAPE FROM THE CASINO.
